datasets by technique

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
desc0 <- readLines("descriptions.Rmd")
desc0 %>% as_tibble() %>% 
  extract(value, into = c("dataset", "description", "technique"), 
          regex = "^([^ ]*) (.*)\\. (.*)$") -> desc
glimpse(desc)
```

```{r}
desc %>% 
  select(-description) %>% 
  separate_rows(technique, sep = ",") -> desc1
desc1 %>% 
  count(technique) %>% 
  arrange(n) %>% 
  View("techniques")
```
